rules.name: For_EOI
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 9 AND 10) OR (4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8)
rules.label: For EOI

fields.name: CA_Message
fields.fieldText:
Total payment added cannot be less than the amount

mentioned in Minimum amount required for CA({!Get_Opportunity.Project__r.Minimum_amount_for_CA__c}).


{!totalPayment} Amount captured in the Minimum amount required for CA.
